source:
TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
The quick-witted scavenger is concerned for his friends' safety.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
トゥワインのモルド族のスカベンジャーは、仲間を助けてほしいようだ。
TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_TODO_01<tab>熟練のスカベンジャーを救助
TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_TODO_03<tab>新米のスカベンジャーを救助
TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_TODO_04<tab>熟練のスカベンジャーと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_MORDSCAVENGER03503_000_000<tab>Oh, my poor friends! Left to be eaten by horrid beasts! I feel terrible about running away, but what choice did I have? No point in us all being killed, now is there?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_MORDSCAVENGER03503_000_000た、大変だヨ！
ケルク遺跡で、宝探しをしていたら、
魔物の群れに襲われたネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_MORDSCAVENGER03503_000_001<tab>Finding someone to go in and retrieve the bodies─I mean, rescue them would absolve me of the blame, yes? If you could go to the ruins of Kelk to look for two Mord scavengers, I would be very grateful!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_MORDSCAVENGER03503_000_001仲間、まだケルク遺跡に残ってるネ！
強そうな旅人さん、どうか魔物をやっつけて、
仲間のスカベンジャーたちを助けてヨ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_MORDSCAVENGER03503_000_010<tab>If anything has happened to my friends, I will never hear the end of it!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_MORDSCAVENGER03503_000_010強そうな旅人さん、
仲間のスカベンジャーたちを助けてヨ！

TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_EXPERTSCAVENGER03503_000_020た、助かったヨ……。
ありがとネ、旅人さん。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_EXPERTSCAVENGER03503_000_021<tab>But it is too early to celebrate. The youngest of our group is still missing. Please, you must find him! I will wait for you outside the ruins in case you need help carrying whatever is left of the poor boy.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_EXPERTSCAVENGER03503_000_021悪いのだけど、もうひとり仲間がいるネ。
そいつも助けてあげてヨ。
私は邪魔にならないよう、安全なところへ行くネ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_NOVICESCAVENGER03503_000_040<tab>Phew... Does that count as a “near-death experience”? I cannot wait to tell my friends!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_NOVICESCAVENGER03503_000_040ふ、ふぅ～……死ぬかと思ったネ……。
助けてくれて、ありがとネ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_NOVICESCAVENGER03503_000_041<tab>But first, we should make a hasty retreat, yes?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_NOVICESCAVENGER03503_000_041助かったなら、長居は無用ネ。
いったん安全なところへ退避ネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_NOVICESCAVENGER03503_000_050<tab>That was the most excitement I have had in a long time! Thank you!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_NOVICESCAVENGER03503_000_050さっきは助けてくれて、ありがとネ。
本当に本当に、ありがとネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_EXPERTSCAVENGER03503_000_060<tab>I cannot thank you enough for saving us. But how did you know we were here?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_EXPERTSCAVENGER03503_000_060旅人さん、助けてくれてありがとネ。
こんな遺跡に助けが来るなんて、思ってなかったネ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_EXPERTSCAVENGER03503_000_061<tab>Hmm... Running away turned out to be the best choice. Not only did he escape, but he sent for help, too.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_EXPERTSCAVENGER03503_000_061アイツは無事に逃げ切って、
助けを呼んできてくれたとネ？
無事で、よかったヨ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_EXPERTSCAVENGER03503_000_062<tab>If he had tried to rescue us himself, we would probably all be dead by now. “Better to run and scavenge another day,” yes? I must remember to thank him.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG018_03503_EXPERTSCAVENGER03503_000_062こうして命があるのも、旅人さんとアイツのおかげネ。
再会したら、感謝しないとネ！
